name: RealWorld-DreamWorld
description:
Every day is a fresh start for our protagonist.

The idea behind the game is that every day our protagonist would face different conflicts and, thanks to an object gathered during the day, she would face a monstrous representation of such conflict in her dreams

Our target was to complete at least the game with one boss for the BuddyUp jam but we're still working on it.

CONTROLS

W A S D - move in different directions

ESC - pause the game

ENTER - interact with objects
